info.description: ElectraLink API Platform EAC API Documentation
info.title: ElectraLink API Platform EAC API ()

get.description: Returns the addresses for a given mpan
Returns the latest agent appointments for current supplier from mpan

post.description: Returns the latest agent appointments for current supplier for given mpans (max 100)

get.description: This endpoint pulls the daily profile coefficient or half hourly profile coefficient data for a given set of attributes.

parameters.description: Set to true to get HHPC data
parameters.name: hhpc

parameters.description: Sets the response format (json, csv). By default, JSON
parameters.name: response-type

get.description: This endpoint pulls the daily profile coefficient or half hourly profile coefficient data for a given MPAN.

parameters.description: Set to true to get HHPC data
parameters.name: hhpc

parameters.description: Sets the response format (json, csv). By default, JSON
parameters.name: response-type

get.description: This endpoint pulls the daily profile coefficient data for a given MPAN.

parameters.description: Sets the response format (json, csv). By default, JSON
parameters.name: response-type

get.description: The EAC endpoint takes the required authentication headers and the mpan identifier and retrieves the MPAN details including EAC values with additional supporting data including the Supplier ID, Supplier EFD, Total EAC, EAC EFT and ET.

parameters.description: Sets the response format (json, xml, csv). By default, JSON
parameters.name: response-type

post.description: The EAC endpoint takes the required authentication headers and a list of the mpan identifiers and retrieves the MPAN details including EAC values with additional supporting data including the Supplier ID, Supplier EFD, Total EAC, EAC EFT and ET.

get.description: The EACFullTPR endpoint takes the required authentication headers and the mpan identifier and retrieves the MPAN details including EAC v2 values with additional supporting data including the Supplier ID, Supplier Name, Supplier EFD, Total EAC, EAC EFT and ET, cust_data.

parameters.description: Sets the response format (json, xml, csv). By default, JSON
parameters.name: response-type

post.description: The GetEacFullTpr endpoint takes the required authentication headers and the MPANs identifiers and retrieves the MPAN details including EAC values with additional supporting data including the Supplier ID, Supplier Name, Supplier EFD, Total EAC, EAC EFT and ET, cust_data (object).

get.description: This endpoint pulls day's response file fro Egnyte FTP, Saves the transforms out JSON.

post.description: This endpoint accepts day's request before 10am and creates a psv file that is uploaded to Egnyte through FTP and saves days request.

delete.description: This endpoint deletes a request by mpan.

get.description: This endpoint lists all the requests created by the user.
This endpoint checks if the response file for the day is available or not.

The EACFullTPR endpoint takes the required authentication headers and the mpan identifier and retrieves the MPAN details including EAC v2 values with additional supporting data including the Supplier ID, Supplier Name, Supplier EFD, Total EAC, EAC EFT and ET, cust_data(array) & additional_detail (object).

parameters.description: Sets the response format (json, xml, csv). By default, JSON
parameters.name: response-type

get.description: The endpoint takes the required authentication headers and the encrypted MPAN identifier and retrieves the MPAN details.

parameters.description: Sets the response format (json, xml, csv). By default, JSON
parameters.name: response-type

get.description: The EncMPANEACFullTPR endpoint takes the required authentication headers and the encrypted MPAN identifier and retrieves the MPAN details including EAC v2 values with additional supporting data including the Supplier ID, Supplier Name, Supplier EFD, Total EAC, EAC EFT and ET, cust_data (object).

parameters.description: Sets the response format (json, xml, csv). By default, JSON
parameters.name: response-type

get.description: Returns encrypted mpan that can be decrytped via v1/encmpanadditionaldetails or v1/encmpaneacfulltpr

parameters.description: Sets the response format (json, xml, csv). By default, JSON
parameters.name: response-type

get.description:
The FilteredMPANHHByPeriod endpoint takes the required authentication headers and the mpan identifier and retrieves the MPAN half hour combined details.

**StartDate, EndDate and RecentPeriod parameters cannot be used in combination**

parameters.description: Has to be one of this format (DWMdwm) i.e. 1W (week), 1D(day), 1M (month)
parameters.name: RecentPeriod

parameters.description: Sets the response format (json, xml, csv). By default, JSON
parameters.name: response-type

get.description:
The FilteredMPANHHByPeriodPreCovid endpoint takes the required authentication headers and the mpan identifier and retrieves the MPAN half hour combined details pre covid.

**StartDate, EndDate and RecentPeriod parameters cannot be used in combination**

parameters.description: Has to be one of this format (DWMdwm) i.e. 1W (week), 1D(day), 1M (month)
parameters.name: RecentPeriod

parameters.description: Sets the response format (json, xml, csv). By default, JSON
parameters.name: response-type

get.description:
The DNOMultiParam endpoint takes the required authentication headers and the mpan identifier and retrieves the MPAN half hour combined details.

**StartDate, EndDate and RecentPeriod parameters cannot be used in combination**

parameters.description: Has to be one of this format (DWMdwm) i.e. 1W (week), 1D(day), 1M (month)
parameters.name: RecentPeriod

parameters.description: Sets the response format (json, xml, csv). By default, JSON
parameters.name: response-type

get.description:

**StartDate, EndDate and RecentPeriod parameters cannot be used in combination**

parameters.description: Has to be one of this format (DWMdwm) i.e. 1W (week), 1D(day), 1M (month)

parameters.description: Sets the response format (json, xml, csv). By default, JSON
parameters.name: response-type

get.description:
The DNOMpanAlias endpoint takes the required authentication headers, the mpan alias and retrieves the MPAN half hour combined details.

**StartDate, EndDate and RecentPeriod parameters cannot be used in combination**

parameters.description: Has to be one of this format (DWMdwm) i.e. 1W (week), 1D(day), 1M (month)

parameters.description: Sets the response format (json, xml, csv). By default, JSON
parameters.name: response-type

get.description:
The FilteredMPANHHCombined endpoint takes the required authentication headers and the mpan identifier and retrieves the MPAN combined details.

**StartDate, EndDate and RecentPeriod parameters cannot be used in combination**

parameters.description: Has to be one of this format (DWMdwm) i.e. 1W (week), 1D(day), 1M (month)

parameters.description: Sets the response format (json, xml, csv). By default, JSON
parameters.name: response-type

get.description: The address update list endpoint takes the required authentication headers and the additional query parameters used to filter the data and returns the records with response time greater than 10 days.
